name: The Last Gift of Christmas
description:
You have murdered Santa Claus for reasons unknown. What will you do next? Deliver the last gift that Santa couldn't, or go on a killing spree? There is a total of 4 Endings each with a unique way to get them. Will you save yourself? Will you save Santa? Or will you ruin Christmas?

This Game was made in 5 days for the Jame Gam Christmas Edition!

IMPORTANT!:

There is a bug that I didn't have the time to fix where sometimes your mouse can't click the object you click on. Just hover your mouse away from that object and then hover on the object again. I hope this isn't too bad..
